items.title: Solano County and other Bay Area Health Officers reaffirm support for a return to full, in-person learning
items.summary: As Bay Area Health Officials, we are excited that more than a million kindergarten through twelfth grade students are returning to school for in-person learning this fall across the wider San Francisco Bay Area, including in Solano County. In the counties of Alameda, Contra Costa, Marin, Monterey, Napa, San Benito, San Francisco, San Mateo, Santa Clara, Santa Cruz, Solano, Sonoma, and the City of Berkeley, many children are back in the classroom for the first time since early 2020.
